items.sentence: Why don't you sit down here and have a drink with us?
What's the most popular alcoholic drink in Australia?
Tom got out of the burning building through a window.
Tom sleeps with his windows open, even in the winter.
Tom told me he's decided to stay for a few more days.
Why do you suspect that Tom was the one who did that?
Tom won't be able to do that without somebody's help.
The dress that Mary is wearing today is her favorite.
I spent my summer vacation at my grandmother's place.
I ducked just in time to avoid the punch aimed at me.
